cont.entity_a: Great sound quality for highs, mids, and lows. Bass is clean but not boomy, suitable for various music genres. Excellent for music, movies, and gaming with a balanced sound field.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is not the greatest but better than TV speakers. Optical input provides clean sound.

cont.entity_a: Very comfortable fit, even for extended use.
cont.entity_b: Tricky to place on the charging base.

cont.entity_a: Good construction but prone to developing small cracks over time.
cont.entity_b: Design is good but has a background hiss.

cont.entity_a: Long cable can be cumbersome but is useful for distant connections.
Sound leakage due to open-ear design, not ideal for quiet environments.
Durability is high with minor cosmetic issues over years of use.
Requires an adapter for 3.5 mm use, included in the package.
Affordable for the quality offered, especially during deals.
cont.entity_b: Affordable price with good listening experience.
Limited range; requires no obstructions between headphones and base. Wireless range is short and can cause signal drop.
Volume control is difficult to use.
